name: One Million PIBBLE March on D.C. **proceeds from ONLY this product benefit the march*
description:
Actress/Comedian Rebecca Corry's life changed the day she met her Angel. Angel is a rescued Pit Bull Terrier from South Central Los Angeles who was found with ears cut off by scissors, battery acid burn down her back, a broken tail, and had been used as a breeder as well as a bait dog. Angel has inspired the live event Stand Up For Pits (www.standupforpits.us) , the March On Washington and by simply being, she continues to inspire and touch the lives of people world wide. We will proudly wear her name on on our shoulders in honor of her and the thousands like her who need our help. We are marching on Washington DC in an effort to end BSL (Breed Specific Legislation) Laws and dog fighting. We are marching because we believe that discrimination enshrined in law, mutilation, torture and mass murder of an innocent soul without a voice will no longer be tolerated. We are marching to make society a safer place, as we believe this is not just an ethical treatment of animal issue but rather a social epidemic. Simply put, our society is broken. We have hundreds of thousands of young Americans (average age 13-21yrs old) committing heinous acts against animals in our own back yard and specifically victimizing Pit Bull Terriers. Studies have shown, time and time again that sociopathic people who commit violent acts against animals will likely and most often times do go on to commit violent crimes against humanity. In addition, BSL Laws send the ill educated message to our children that a solution to a problem is to fear it, hate it and ban it. That thinking is ignorant and it will not be tolerated against living thing. Race, religion or breed. We are a better America than that. We, as a society, have an enormous problem on our hands and the time is NOW to do something about it. It is up to US to be the voices of the innocent and to protect them. We will march on May 3rd, 2014 and expect our voices to be heard.

100% of the proceeds (minus cost) of this limited edition One Million PIBBLE March On Washington DC will go directly towards the cost to rally at the US CAPITAL. Estimated cost of the rally (stage, lights, sound, walkie talkies, banners etc) is currently at $8000.00. This cost could be significantly more depending on how many people attend and how much more equipment would be needed. If you are not able to attend the march, please know by you purchasing this shirt, you have contributed to the cause and are making a difference. Consider wearing your shirt the day of rally in support no matter where you are and perhaps even organizing a march of your own! To read more about the petition that will be delivered to the governor of Maryland and sign, go to https://www.causes.com/standupforpits To keep up with updates on the ONE MILLION PIBBLE MARCH be sure to join the Facebook Event Page

More Info
  • Triblend 50% Poly - 25% Cotton - 25% Rayon blend.
  • Gray Tee with 3-color print and 4 screen locations.
  • Made and printed in the USA.
  • Size Chart

name: Save-A-LIfe Burnout Pull-Over Hoodie - Charcoal
description:
Rooted in our desire to save a many pit's lives as possible, the Save-A-Life design is intended to not only look good, but spark conversations as to the meaning behind the shirt and get people talking about pitties! We wanted to make sure you could still show your support of our 4 legged friends even if you need to toss on something a bit warmer over your tee. This zip-up hoodie is INSANELY SOFT and INCREDIBLY COMFORTABLE! The 50/50 cotton poly blend combined with the burnout treatment will make this both a staple in our closet or drawer...but you frankly will not want to take it off! *Also note...tossing your hood up let's those behind you see your pit pride with the KAE-O logo! **AND...these are great for ladies as well...they are just sized for guys!!! More Info
  • Super Soft 50% Cotton - 50% Poly blend.
  • Charcoal Hoodie with 2-color print and 3 screen locations.
  • Born from Love and printed in the USA.
  • Size Chart

name: Save-A-Life Men's Vintage Tee - Black
description:
Rooted in our desire to save a many pit's lives as possible, the Save-A-Life design is intended to not only look good, but spark conversations as to the meaning behind the shirt and get people talking about pitties! This particular shirt is our super soft vintage cotton/poly tee that is rough around the edges. You'll notice from the pictures that both the neckline and sleeves have been ripped up a bit to give it that 'broken in' look. As with all of our shirts...the more you wash this one...the softer it gets! More Info
  • Super Soft 55% Cotton - 45% Poly blend.
  • Black Shirt with 2-color print.
  • Made and printed in the USA.
  • Size Chart

name: Pit Love Women's Burnout Tee - Black
description:
Well, we're not too sure there's much explanation needed here!!! Pit Love can go both ways! Show yours with words, and the shirt will show how much your pittie likes your ti....well, you get it! More Info

name: Big Paw Women's Burnout Hoodie - Pink
description:
One must take a moment and look through ALL of the pictures to understand why we call this one the Big Paw! Not only will you be making a huge KAE-O statement with our logo on your back - you'll also be wearing your heart...or paw on your sleeve with our Save-A-Life design showing our support of helping our our pit friends! This zip-up hoodie is INSANELY SOFT and INCREDIBLY COMFORTABLE! The 50/50 cotton poly blend combined with the burnout treatment will make this both a staple in our closet or drawer...but you frankly will not want to take it off! This hoodie fit's a bit more casual than our RAW hoodies...but to us...that's not a bad thing. More Info
  • Super Soft 50% Cotton - 50% Poly blend.
  • Pink Hoodie with 2-color print and 3 screen locations.
  • Born from Love and printed in the USA.
  • Size Chart

name: LOVE Women's Burnout Tee Hoodie - White
description:
Simply put...we LOVE our pit bulls and we want you to be able to show your affection too! Inspired by Robert Indiana's Love Statue in Philidelphia - our LOVE design is a staple in the KAE-O line and will be here for a very long time! We've popped our LOVE design on this crazy soft burnout hoodie and put a little surprise under the back of the hood like all of our other hoodies! More Info
  • Burnout Hoodie 50% Poly - 25% Cotton - 25% Rayon blend.
  • White Burnout Tee Hoodie with 2-color print and 2 screens.
  • Made and printed in the USA.
  • Size Chart

name: LOVE Womens Raw Hoodie - White
description:
Simply put...we LOVE our pit bulls and we want you to be able to show your affection too! Inspired by Robert Indiana's Love Statue in Philidelphia - our LOVE design is a staple in the KAE-O line and will be here for a very long time! We introduced the design on our tee products...it was time for us to get you prepared for the cooler months with our Raw Edge zip-up hoodie. Not only is this hoodie nice and cozy, it also has a hidden feature...a little pocket for your ipod and rivet to allow your cord to run inside the jacket so you don't get your headphones tangled up with your leash when you're out on a walk with your pooch! (leash and dog not included!) *Please note this hoodie is a little fashion forward in it's sizing and tends to run a little smaller than our Burnout Hoodie. More Info

name: Fightwear 3-Paws Men's Burnout Tee - Black
description:
We can't quite tell you were the inspiration came from for this design! Maybe it's red for stop, yellow for slowing people down so they can learn the truth about pit bulls and green so they can go buy their own KAE-O clothing or spread the good word about pits! Regardless, this was our first KAE-O Fightwear design and will remain a casual staple for years to come! More Info

name: Defeating Ignorance Men's Tri-Blend Tee - Grey
description:
This is one of our first two designs at KAE-O. It's intent is obvious - "Defeating Ignorance One Mind At A Time". When someone asks what KAE-O stands for and what the shirt represents, let them know how mis-represented the pit breed is and take a moment to 'KAE-O' (Knock Out) some stereotypes brought up in conversation! You may have to ask more than a few friends to translate between the lines! More Info

name: Save-A-LIfe Women's Raw Hoodie w/ White Accents
description:
Subtle on the front - bold on the back! We decided that since people see you much longer when they are walking behind than when walking towards you...we should probably toss our Save-A-Life logo in a more viewed area. Guys...now you have a reason to stare!!! Note the words and paw on this beauty are in a subtle but striking white. Just as with our LOVE hoodie...it was time for us to get you prepared for the cooler months and do with our Raw Edge zip-up hoodie. Not only is this hoodie nice and cozy, it also has a hidden feature...a little pocket for your ipod and rivet to allow your cord to run inside the jacket so you don't get your headphones tangled up with your leash when you're out on a walk with your pooch! (leash and dog not included!) *Please note this hoodie is a little fashion forward in it's sizing and tends to run a little smaller than our Burnout Hoodie. More Info
